alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and south central Duval Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Switzerland, or over Fruit Cove, moving southeast at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Bayard, Durbin and Switzerland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
